system.sheetlocked: Voc√™ precisa desbloquear a ficha antes!

era.changeera: Tem certeza que deseja mudar a era?
era.changeerahint: A ficha j√° possui esta era, tem certeza que quer reset√°-la?

settings.permissionsettingshint: All gathered settings about World permissions and what a user can do.
settings.worldversionhint: Used to know if World patch is needed.
settings.advantagerollshint: Are you to use the permanent (check) values or temporary (not checked) of e.g. Willpower in rolls. Requires restart of Foundry VTT.
settings.attributesettingshint: There are two options to choose from. Either using the standard from 20th ed where you have Appearance and Perception and calculates Willpower as a stat. Or you use 5th ed, exchanging Appearance and Perception with Composure and Resolve and calculates Willpower with Composure + Resolve. 20th ed are default. After this setting has changed you have to restart Foundry VTT.
settings.observersactorpermissionhint: This settings able it to limit how much an observer can see of a sheet, either they can see the full sheet or they can only see the Bio tab.
settings.limitedactorpermission: Limited users has full view permission
settings.limitedactorpermissionhint: This settings able it to limit how much an limited user can see of a sheet, either they can see the full sheet or they can only see the Bio tab.
settings.observerspartialsheet: Observers can see Bio tab only.
settings.limitedfullsheet: Limited users can see full sheet
settings.limitedpartialsheet: Limited users can see Bio tab only.
settings.minipartialsheet: Limited users can only see some of the Bio tab
settings.changeactorimagehint: Everyone are allowed to change an Actor images on an Actor they can edit.
settings.changeitemimagehint: Everyone are allowed to change an Item images on an Item they can edit.
settings.itemadministratorhint: What user permission is required for be able to be an item administrator, thus be able to set e.g. an item's type on Item then can edit.
settings.usesplatfonthint: With this setting you turn off the special font-style used by the different sheet on a world level.
settings.usesworldanvilhint: With this setting you will show a box in Bio where you can store the link to that sheet's World Anvil page.
settings.huntersettingshint: World settings used in Hunter the Reckoning.
settings.werewolfsettingshint: World settings used in Werewolf the Apocalypse.
settings.edgesettingshints: According to the rules of Hunter the Reckoning there are two ways to gain Edges, using Virtues are the default one.
settings.ragesettingshints: In Werewolf if the Garou has more Rage than Willpower they get a penalty to their social rolls.
settings.therollofonehint: Default 20th dice setting - According to the 20th rules all ones reduce number of success by one.
settings.useOnesDamage: Use rule of '1's in damage rolls
settings.useOnesSoak: Use rule of '1's in soak rolls
settings.lowestdifficultyhint: With this setting you can set what is the lowest difficulty you wish to use in your world.
settings.specialityaddsuccesshint: Default use of specialities - adds a number of successes on the roll of 10s.
settings.specialityreducediffhint: If use of speciality the difficulty of the roll is lowered.
settings.tenaddsuccesshint: A change of how handling 10s to always adds a number of successes to the roll.
settings.explodingdicehint: In revised rules when rolling a 10 you got to add one additional die and add the result.
settings.diceruleshint: How the system handles rolling the dices.
settings.erasettingshint: The world settings regards to eras

bio.name: Nome
bio.noshiftertype: No shifter type has been selected in Settings tab

advantages.ragewarning: Sua f√∫ria tempor√°ria √© maior que sua f√∫ria permanente
advantages.willpowerchange: Willpower is based on Composure + Resolve in System Setting and can not be altered!

path.headline: Path
path.innervoice: Path of Power and the Inner Voice

power.rank0: Voc√™ √© um filhote, ent√£o ainda n√£o pode ter dons
power.unsorteddisciplines: Here is all unsorted discipline powers which needs to get a selected Discipline. Click on the headline to sort one.
power.unsortedpaths: Here is all unsorted path powers which needs to get a selected Path. Click on the headline to sort one.
power.unsortedarts: Here is all unsorted art powers which needs to get a selected Art. Click on the headline to sort one.
power.unsortededges: Here is all unsorted edge powers which needs to get a selected Edge. Click on the headline to sort one.
power.unsortedlores: Here is all unsorted lore powers which needs to get a selected Lore. Click on the headline to sort one.

settings.frenzyroll: Set die modifier on frenzy rolls
settings.usedadvantages: Set what type of advantages the sheet are using
settings.usedpowers: Set what type of powers the sheet are using
settings.setdarkages: Sheet set to Dark Ages era!
settings.setwildwest: Sheet set to Wild West era!
settings.maxability: This setting sets the maximum value an ability can have
settings.soakinfoone: The total value used in soak with attribute, armor and bonus
settings.soakinfothree: Can soak - if soak if this type of damage is normally allowed
settings.initiativeinfoone: Value - the base calculated value based on total value of attributes
settings.initiativeinfothree: Total - the total value used in combat with all active bonuses

era.headline: Era
era.infoone: To change this setting means that the abilities of the sheet is re-configurated to fit the chosen area.
era.infotwo: This can cause existing abilities to be hidden.

bonus.headline: B√¥nus
bonus.attributebonushint: This bonus adds/subtracts a value to the selected attribute itself altering the total value by the selected amount. Can go beyond the max rating of the attribute.
bonus.attributebonusdicehint: This bonus adds/subtracts a value to the selected attribute itself altering the total value of dices used when the attribute is used. Can go beyond the max rating of the attribute.
bonus.attributediffhint: This bonus changes the difficulty of any use of this attribute when you make a roll.
bonus.attributesucchint: This bonus adds/subtracts a value to the number of rolled successes with this selected attribute.
bonus.abilitybonushint: This bonus adds/subtracts a value to the selected ability itself altering the total value by the selected amount. Can go beyond the max rating of the ability.
bonus.abilitydiffhint: This bonus changes the difficulty of any use of this ability when you make a roll.
bonus.soakbonushint: This bonus changes the value of the number dice rolled when making any soak rolls.
bonus.healthbuffhint: This bonus adds the number of bruised health levels the character has.
bonus.initbonushint: This bonus adds the number to the initiative score.
bonus.movebonushint: This bonus adds bonuses to the character's movement.

info.spendexp: If you have spent the experience or not

settings.attribute1: Value - the value of that Attribute
settings.attribute2: Bonus - number of bonus dice on that Attribute
settings.attribute3: Total - the total number of dice of that Attribute
settings.attribute4: Max - the highest available value of that Attribute
settings.healthvalue: Value - number health boxes character has for that level
settings.healthpenalty: Penalty - wound penalty character has for that level

items.spheres: Fill what Spheres and what level that are needed to cast the Rote

dice.noencounterfound: No encounter found in Combat Tracker
dice.characteradded: Character already added to Combat Tracker
dice.rollingremainactivetext: Each success heals one health level of any kind of damage. No matter how much damage is healed, the character enters a berserk frenzy. A werewolf gains a Battle Scar whenever she successfully remains active.

aretecasting.increaseddifficulty: Due to high difficulty, number of successes required to succeed goes up by
aretecasting.instrumentnotusing: Using instruments when you don‚Äôt need to
aretecasting.instrumentpersonalitem: Using personal item from target (sympathetic magick)
aretecasting.resonanceappropriate: Appropriate Resonance (personal, instrument, ritual, or Tass)
aretecasting.resonanceopposed: Opposed Resonance (personal, instrument, ritual, or Tass)
aretecasting.researchdone: Researches lore about subject before using magick
aretecasting.distanttarget: Distant or hidden target or subject
aretecasting.effectsseveral: Juggling several Effects at once +1 per two Effects
aretecasting.dominoeffect: Domino Effect +1 per two coincidences after first
aretecasting.extendedcastingdesc: Extended casting is when you roll for the same magic time and time again adding the successes together for each roll, each try adds +1 to the difficulty.
aretecasting.keepdiffdesc: Keep difficulty is When you are to use extended casting but the difficulty are not to be increased for each roll.

soak.missingdamage: Voc√™ precisa selecionar o tipo de dano

power.missingrealm: You need to select a Realm

variant.info: This setting sets what variant of the sheet it is set to use.
variant.description: This setting can be changed under the sheet's settings
